text:
@GregAbbott_TX There's a 99.5-99.8% survival rate, moron.  Vitamin C/D will help people avoid it & hydroxychloroquine, in conjunction with antibiotics & zinc, is extremely successful in curing it. Stop pushing fear propaganda and a test which is useless.
